actions.message:
**Main Help Message**
For navigating trought bot commands use the reactions below.
🔳 - This page
⚙ - Config
📷 - Image
✨ - Miscellaneous
🔨 - Moderation
actions.name: Edit Message

actions.message:
**⚙ - Config**
```
csnipe [#channel] - returns info on mentioned channel
msnipe [@user] - return info on mentioned user
request - request a feature
warnings [user] - check the amount of warnings for a user
poll [question] - Start a poll in a channel
prefix - changes the server prefix
rolemenu - setup reaction roles
setuptch [channel]- setup reaction role channel
mydata - send in DM what information the bot has saved for the user
```
actions.name: Edit Message

actions.message:
**📷 - Image**
```
mc [text] - creats a minecraft achevment
usercard - Brind up a usercard for user that used the command
changemymind [text] - Returns a ChangeMyMind Meme
trumptweet [text] Returns a fake trump tweet
emojilist - returns with a list of the server emotes
flip - flips the table
catfact - random cat fact
panda - show a random panda pic
kanna - Make a Kanna Meme!
hug - returns a hug gif
pat - returns a random pat meme
lenny - returns a random lenny meme
randomemoji - returns a random emoji
emolets - a-z in emotes
clyde [text] - set text to a meme
```
actions.name: Edit Message

actions.message:
**✨ - Miscellaneous**
```
steamstats - send you a DM of steam server stats
report [user] [report] - sends report to #report channel
warnings [user] - shows amount of warnings for that user dont put the user to find your current amount of warnings
donate - give you a link if you would like to help support
badges [user] - checks the users status with the bot
rulesaccept - accepts rules and give you the varify rank
roll - roll the dice
flip - flips the table
dadjoke - returns a random dad joke
joke - returns a random joke
imdb [movie title] -  returns infomation about movie mentioned
8ball [question] - ask 8ball a question replays with yes or no
invite - creates invite for server and channel command is ran in
invitebot - returns a invite for this bot to join your server
```
actions.name: Edit Message

actions.message:
**🔨 - Moderation**
```
csnipe [#channel] - give infommation about mentioned channel
msnipe [@user] - give info about tagged user
roles - lists current roles on the server
news [#channel] [text] - Send news to a channel
warn [user] [reason] - warns a user
clearwarnings [user] - clears warnings for that user
mute [user] [reason] - mutes user with reason
unmute [user] - unmute the mentioned user
kick [user] [reason] - kicks user with reason
ban [user] [reason] -bans user with reason
multiban [user1] [user2] [user3] - Ban up to 5 users at once
oreport [user] [report] - send report to server owner do not spam
pruge [number] - removes up to 100 msgs from chat cants be older the 14 days old
delete [nummber] - does the same as purge
```
actions.name: Edit Message

actions.code:
let word = ""

var only = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwzyz"


tempVars("words").toLowerCase().split('').forEach(function(char){ word += only.includes(char) ? " :regional_indicator_" + char + ":" : "   "})

msg.channel.send(word)
actions.name: Run Script

name: prefix
desc:
Change your servers prefix by doing %prefix%prefix [prefix] and the bot will respond using that.

The prefix can be anything, it doesn't just have to be a symbol!

actions.message: Prefix is already set to `${serverVars("tag")}` Do `mybot_prefix [newprefix]` to change it.
actions.name: Send Message
Run Script

actions.message: The prefix has been changed to `${serverVars("tag")}`
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
😭 You can't mute thin air! Here's the proper way! `mute @user/uid time reason`

Note, the time has to be w = weeks; d = days; h = hours; m = mins; s = seconds, with no spaces.

Example: `mute @TestUser 5d24m`
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: 😒 Sorry about that. Couldn't find anyone in this server with that ID.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: 😝 You can't mute yourself! Have someone else do it.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
**Main Help Message**
🔳 - Main page
⚙ - Config
💬 - Status
✨ - Miscellaneous
🔨 - Moderation
For navigating trought bot commands use the reactions below.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
**Main Help Message**
For navigating trought bot commands use the reactions below.
🔳 - This page
⚙ - Config
💬 - Status
✨ - Miscellaneous
🔨 - Moderation
actions.name: Edit Message

actions.message:
**⚙ - Config**
```
botinvite - gives a invite for the bot to the server and link to our support server
bothelp - Brings up this help menu
botvoice - create a temp voice channel on server command is used on
botdm @user [msg] - DM a user with the bot
serverlist - returns a list of servers bot is connected to
serverlisttxt - creates a txt file with all servers listed and places it on the host machine
leaveserverid [ServerID] - removes bot from server mentioned with ID
leaveservername [ServerName] - removes from from server with mentioned name
botinfo - returns a list of bot info
findserver [Server Name] - returns a invte for mentioned server if bot is connected to it
addbadge @user [Badge] - Gives a bot wide badge to user
delbadge @user [Badge] - Removes a badge from a user
```
actions.name: Edit Message

actions.message:
**💬 - Status**
```
botstatus - set a preset msg for the bot status
bottwitch [Twitchtv link] - Change the stream link of the bot
botavi [link] - Change bots user img
botname [name] - change the bots name
botnick [nickname] - change the bots nickname
```
actions.name: Edit Message

actions.message:
**✨ - Miscellaneous**
```
botsay [msg] - talk with the bot
eval [script] - run scripts with this command WARNING DANGER!!
npm [package] - Tryes to install a npm package for the bot 
```
actions.name: Edit Message

actions.message:
**🔨 - Moderation**
```
serverlist - returns list of all servers the bot is in
serverlisttxt - saves a list of a servers to text file on host
leaveserverid [server id] - forces bot to leave said server
leaveservername [server name] - forces bot to leave said server
botleave - forces bot to leave the current server from run command
```
actions.name: Edit Message
